summary: This command uses FFmpeg to extract a 60-second segment from the input video "karaoke_effects_source.mp4", applying the embedded ASS subtitles from "Output.ass" as effects, and saves the result as "out.mp4".

details.comment: This command uses FFmpeg to extract a 60-second segment from the input video "karaoke_effects_source.mp4", applying the embedded ASS subtitles from "Output.ass" as effects, and saves the result as "out.mp4".
